Package interfaces

Interface GeneralReposInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GeneralRepos
    public interface GeneralReposInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Operational interface of a remote object of type GeneralRepos. It provides the functionality to access the General Repository of Information.
